name: IUN MBA for Professionals in Michigan City
content: Designed for busy people like you, our 18-month weekend MBA for professionals program offers the most sought-after skills for senior and C-level executives including leadership, teamwork, and Lean Six Sigma Certification. Classes meet every other Saturday. Empowering you to manage your time between work, school and life commitments without sacrificing personal experiences and connections. You will engage in a personal assessment of factors that affect leadership success and receive executive coaching. Lean Six Sigma Certification is incorporated in the program. Your program concludes with an international business experience. Venue details: 402 Franklin Street, Michigan City, Indiana, 46360, United States Date and Time: On Tuesday December 06, 2022 at 9:00 am to Saturday January 14, 2023 at 9:00 am
